mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict_value (unioncode, dictcode, itemcode, itemname) values (#{unioncode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictcode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemname, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into sys_dict_value (unioncode, dictcode, itemcode, itemname) values (#{item.unioncode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dictcode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.itemcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemname, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from sys_dict_value where 1=1 and unioncode = #{0} and dictcode = #{1} and itemcode = #{2}
